original_title: Behind the Curtain: The Making of Moscow
overview: If you have ever wondered what it's like to make a gay porno video, this is your chance to find out. Follow award-winning porn director The Bear on his two-month journey to mid-winter Russia, and witness this fascinating documentary about making the video MOSCOW, The Power of Submission. You will see ten mega-hot Russian models before, during, and after the cameras roll. You will hear the model's experiences straight from them and learn how a major, multi-award-winning gay video is made. This is a unique experience to discover what goes on behind the curtain!
title: Behind the Curtain: The Making of Moscow
